projects.title: SOS Emergency App
description: Developed and launched an SOS emergency feature on Fitbit that instantly notifies preset contacts with real-time user coordinates using GPS in 1 to 1.5 seconds.
Created a location-tracking feature for Versa 3 using JavaScript in Fitbit Studio, interfacing with a Node.js backend.
Designed and deployed a Node.js server to process data and trigger emergency alerts to predefined contacts.

projects.title: Speech Processing and Analysis
description: Built a Deep Neural Network classifier to analyze speech data for Gender Identification (78%) and Speaker Recognition (45%).
Implemented a real-time voice activity detection system with signal processing techniques to reduce false detections by 25%.
Enhanced speech recognition by 30% through feature extraction and noise reduction algorithms.

projects.title: Anduno Sense - Wireless Sensor Hub
description: Automated control of electronic components via Android app using Bluetooth, light sensors, and AGPS on an Arduino board.
Developed a wireless sensor hub (Anduno Sense) with real-time control through an Android application.
Created a user-friendly app compatible with Android OS 2.2+ for managing connected sensors.
